column3: Cattle Death Loss: Released May 5, 2006, by the National Agricultural Statistics Service (NASS), Agricultural Statistics Board, U.S. Department of Agriculture.
Non-Lethal Methods Used to Prevent Losses of Cattle and Calves to Predators,
1/  Missing data are not published to avoid disclosure of individual operations.
2/  Use of multiple non-lethal methods may result in percentages summing to greater than 100.
